properties.areaDesc: Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 9:40AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 15 knots from the north
with gusts up to 22 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 8 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 11 feet.

* WHERE...Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI, Harbor Beach to Port
Sanilac MI, Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI and Outer Saginaw
Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 9 AM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 9 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
